title: The Mighty Lion
description: Lions are large cats known for their majestic manes (in males) and powerful roar. They are social animals that live in groups called prides, which are found primarily in Africa and India.

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of lions?
Which of the following is true about a male lion's mane?
options: It is used to attract a mate
It is a sign of aggression
questions.correct_answer: It is used to attract a mate
